overview: This course covers the basics of programming and gradually progresses to more advanced topics. Each week, you'll build on your knowledge and apply what you've learned through hands-on coding exercises and projects.
requirements: No prior programming experience is required. Students should have access to a computer with an internet connection.

instructorInfo.name: Professor Coding Guru
instructorInfo.bio: An experienced programmer with a passion for teaching. Holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science and has worked on various industry projects.

reviews.reviewText: This course was fantastic! Professor Coding Guru explained complex concepts in a way that was easy to understand. The hands-on projects were especially helpful.
I enjoyed the course content and found the syllabus well-structured. The instructor was knowledgeable and responsive to questions.
